about_the_game:
A NEW MELODY IN THE WORLD OF ROGUELIKES

Bard's Fault is the debut title from Sunabi Studios, a cooperative roguelike filled with action, mystery, and musicality.

Step into the role of a lost spirit, summoned by the enigmatic Lord of Time after an untimely death. Without memories of who you were or how you died, you’re given a second chance to uncover your destiny and break free from an eternal cycle.

UPGRADE, ADAPT, SURVIVE

With fast-paced and intense mechanics, Bard's Fault challenges you in a roguelike that rewards skill, strategy, and adaptation. Each attempt teaches you something new, turning failures into lessons and victories into celebrations. Survive waves of enemies, fight smarter, and enhance your abilities with every challenge.

HARMONIZE WITH YOUR ALLIES (CO-OP)

In this cooperative roguelike, success lies in harmony with your companions. Face increasingly challenging waves of enemies as you combine skills, unlock powerful upgrades, and master unique character combos. Play with friends and unleash your full power!

A JOURNEY OF DESTINY AND CHORDS

With vibrant and personality-filled settings, Bard's Fault delivers an immersive adventure where music, mystery, and action intertwine. Time is running out—do you have what it takes to break the cycle of battles and fulfill your true destiny?
